dcterms:description: EndoUDA is a dataset containing endoscopic images for Barrett's Esophagus from two modalities: White Light Imaging (WLI) and Narrow-Band Imaging (NBI). It includes 799 images for Barrett's Esophagus and 1042 images for polyps, with a focus on improving segmentation performance across different imaging modalities.
dcterms:title: EndoUDA

dcterms:description: HyperKvasir is a comprehensive multi-class image and video dataset for gastrointestinal endoscopy, designed to facilitate research in the field by providing a diverse set of annotated images and videos.
dcterms:title: HyperKvasir
